column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Ok so let's start with the drinks
column2: "The Bosscat" is the way of life; simple and refreshing. I love everything about this place. The decor
column4: and amazing staff keeps me coming back. And
column6: the French fires and Mac & Cheese. Chrisia & Bryce are truly great mixologist. They are so knowledgeable and truly passionate about what they do. Knowing that they love their job and love working for Bosscat Kitchen shows what great of a place this is.
